page.title: 04LOCAL NEWS, CWMBRAN
page.content: A Cwmbran Pensioner complains that Court Farm's Roads look as though they have been fired at by 25 lbs.shells and Oak Street is like a German Mine- field.He says that the Highway's Inspector must fly in a helicopter above the clouds.Because they claim such high expenses councillors should take off their jackets and mend the roads. {WHEELIES-EXPERIMENT.}Cwmbran wishes to do away with plastic refuse bags which animals rip open,scattering rubbish. Instead,plastic bins on wheels are being tried.Residents are delighted as neighbourhoods are much cleaner.
